::Lord Jhiaxus::
   
  Jhiaxus listens to Zarak, Hydras and Myrmidin.
   
  Jhiaxus then bring up a map on the conference screen.
   
  Jhiaxus: I agree. A point away from both bases. How about here?
   
  Jhiaxus points to the spot on the map that will one day be Detroit, Michigan.(OOC: No reason why.)

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
          
--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Hydras:
> 
> Hydras liked the idea and said "choose the point altought I think 
> that a close point will hint eventually to us, we should set the 
> clone far of Atlantis and far of our base. after his capture, we 
> should knock him out and mask his signature... after fake the femme�s
> death of course "

Myrmidon, who had been sitting in the council chambers silently thus
far finally nodded and spoke, "The plan is good." Myrmidon frowned
thoughtfully for a moment, "We have the femme captured. Take her radio
put it on the puppet and use it transmit the signal, and they can chase
it until we are ready." 

Myrmidon leaned back in his chair as he finished, frowning to himself,
folding his arms over his powerful chest.

Preston
(Myrmidon)
